Clip.Title: AFRICAN DREAM
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Many immigrants from Zimbabwe come to South Africa to seek their "African dream." On the other hand, South Africans whose jobs have been taken away are showing violent reactions against these immigrant workers.

Clip.Title: AFRICAN DREAM
Clip.Episode: Power to the People: Africa's Mineral Corridor
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Africa is abundant in natural resources. However, until recently, Africa had just been a provider. Enormous Western capital had taken a major part in reaping most of the huge profits.

Clip.Title: AFRICAN DREAM
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Rwanda was rocked by the ethnic massacres and environmental devastation in the 1990s. But during the past several years, the country achieved a phenomenal recovery called the "Rwanda miracle" with an average annual economic growth rate of nearly 10%.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of New Brunswick is an ecological wonder- this aerial survey soars above incredible rock formations, peat farms, and some of the East Coast's most impressive sand dunes.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Trek across the vast plains of China on the cramped but culturally diverse train line.

Clip.Title: AFRICAN DREAM
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Many immigrants from Zimbabwe come to South Africa to seek their "African dream." On the other hand, South Africans whose jobs have been taken away are showing violent reactions against these immigrant workers.

Clip.Title: STORIES FROM THE VAULTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: At the Smithsonian, science and history - and even art and design - are used to help predict the future. Join host Tom Cavanagh as we look at designers who have shaped our future, sneak a peek at museum of the future, and talk to scientists helping to preserve the future of the tropical rainforest.

Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Meet the deranged serial killers and the determined FBI agents who inspired one of Hollywood's most terrifying thrillers and gave Anthony Hopkins and Jodie Foster the roles of a lifetime. We go behind the scenes at the FBI's Behavioral Science Unit to meet the profilers who became the basis for Harris's characters and to uncover the details of real-life murderers Ed Gein, Ted Bundy, and others.

Clip.Title: PLAY ON JOHN: A LIFE IN MUSIC
Clip.Episode: Play on John: A Life in Music
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Before Bob Dylan and The Band there was John Chohen: the man who saved and celebrated American Folk music.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.Episode: From Valle Isarco to Val Senales
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Valle Isarco to Val Senales, fly over the valleys of Alto Adige with its lakes, villages and flowered balconys.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.Episode: From Valle Aurina to Alpe di Siusi
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Valle Aurina to Alpe di Siusi we continue our journey along the route to the Glacier of Similaun, where Ötzi was discovered.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The moon is our nearest neighbour in space and the keeper of some of our oldest secrets. It is also our cosmic stepping stone to a future among the planets.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Thanks to a fleet of advanced spacecraft orbiting around and even landing on the surface of Mars, a new portrait of this red planet is emerging. Mars is teetering on the border between a living and a dead world.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: OASIS EARTH
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey with a crew of astronauts as they experience the Earth's beauty from 233km above it.
